message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $8,500 is quite low for the value this product offers. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you at $8,800. Can you consider that?
